Did Nikola Tesla die alone?	Nikola Tesla died alone.
Did Nikola Tesla die alone?	Nikola Tesla died alone.
Did Nikola Tesla die alone?	Yes
Was Nikola Tesla close friends with Mark Twain?	Nikola Tesla was close friends with Mark Twain.
Was Nikola Tesla close friends with Mark Twain?	Yes
Did Nikola Tesla use a technique called picture thinking?	Nikola Tesla used a technique called picture thinking.
Did Nikola Tesla use a technique called picture thinking?	Yes
When did Nikola Tesla appear on the cover of Time Magazine?	On Tesla's 75th birthday in 1931, Time magazine put him on its cover.
When did Nikola Tesla appear on the cover of Time Magazine?	1931
Who became adversaries with Nikola Tesla?	Nikola Tesla became adversaries with Edison.
Who became adversaries with Nikola Tesla?	Edison
Where did Nikola Tesla move to in 1880?	In 1880, Nikola Tesla moved to Budapest.
Where did Nikola Tesla move to in 1880?	Budapest
Was Nikola Tesla's mother illiterate?	Nikola Tesla's mother never learned to read.
Was Nikola Tesla's mother illiterate?	Yes
How many siblings did Nikola Tesla have?	Nikola Tesla had four siblings.
How many siblings did Nikola Tesla have?	4
Was Nikola Tesla a vegetarian?	 In his later years Tesla became a vegetarian.
Was Nikola Tesla a vegetarian?	Yes
